item.title: D2XX-LV v1.3.0.7
item.description:
Product: D2XX-LV v1.3.0.7
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 17 Jul 2025 14:28:29 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin / LevyLab

Description: This library provides an interface to FTDI's D2XX drivers, designed to align more closely with LabVIEW programming conventions.

Release Notes: Issue #5
- Updates palette and installation location
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: D2XX v1.3.0.8
item.description:
Product: D2XX v1.3.0.8
Company: FTDI
Release Date: Thu, 17 Jul 2025 12:17:49 -0400
Packager: FTDI / Patrick Irvin

Description: Communicate with FTDI devices using D2XX drivers. This package organizes files provided by FTDI into a LV library and adds support for 64 bit LabVIEW.

Release Notes: Issue #5
- Updated installation location (instr.lib/_D2XX/...)
- Reorganize palette
- Package requires Windows OS
item.dc:creator: FTDI

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.10.0.24
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.10.0.24
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 15:35:52 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: [1.10.0]
- Hide controls and indicators that are not applicable to the OptiCool
- Ensure UI uses only "local" communication
- Updated ZMQ backend
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.21.0.13
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.21.0.13
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 25 Jun 2025 14:45:29 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.21.0]
- Ensure UI uses only "local" communication
- Updated ZMQ backend
- #101 fix Logging button behavior

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Transport v1.9.6.18
item.description:
Product: Transport v1.9.6.18
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Tue, 24 Jun 2025 20:59:40 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: VIs for scripting and performing transport measurments.

[Transport.lvclass]
Basic transport measurments:
- Lockin vs time (Lockin_time.vi)
- Lockin Sweep Mode (Lockin_sweep.vi)

Release Notes: [1.9.6]
#116 fix Lockin close in Lockin_sweep and Lockin_time
item.dc:creator: Levylab
